**Variable**                | **definition of variable**
----------------------------|---------------------------------------------------
total blue space            | Total of all categories of blue spaces (water + wetlands).  
total green spaces          | Total of all categories of green spaces (forests + green urban areas).  
total blue and green spaces | Total of both green and blue space (forests, green urban areas, water, wetlands).  
Land use mix                | Mix consists of the following categories:
                                                        1. Built-up areas
                                                        2. Industrial & Commercial
                                                        3. Infrastructure
                                                        4. Ports
                                                        5. Green urban areas
                                                        6. Sports & leisure facilities
                                                        7. Agricultural areas
                                                        8. Other natural areas
                                                        9. Blue spaces
                                                        10. Other
